title: Blow Up the Roses
description: How much pain, horror and anguish can one cul d’sac endure?Why is so much murder, mystery and sexual brutality condensed among the few duplex homes built so close together on the Elm Street cul d’sac?The answers lie within the language of flowers; and the language of flowers can be brutally frank.Of course, if you speak it, it can also save your life.
author: Randy Attwood
